title: Implementation of activation Swish
body_html:
This PR focuses on the implementation of the "Swish" activation function given by this paper: Swish.

Let me know what you think. My implementation uses in the pre-existing implementations of Sigmoid, and hence I thought it would not be required to add the activation from scratch.
body_text:
This PR focuses on the implementation of the "Swish" activation function given by this paper: Swish.
Let me know what you think. My implementation uses in the pre-existing implementations of Sigmoid, and hence I thought it would not be required to add the activation from scratch.
body:
This PR focuses on the implementation of the "Swish" activation function given by this paper: [Swish](https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.05941).

Let me know what you think. My implementation uses in the pre-existing implementations of `Sigmoid`, and hence I thought it would not be required to add the activation from scratch.
